mapper.select: /* ReviewMapper.findReviewsByMember */ SELECT r.review_id, r.member_code, r.acm_id, r.resv_id, r.content, r.written_at, a.acm_name FROM tbl_reviews r LEFT JOIN tbl_acm a ON r.acm_id = a.acm_id WHERE r.member_code = #{memberCode} ORDER BY r.written_at DESC

/* ReviewMapper.findReviewsByMember */ SELECT r.review_id, r.member_code, r.acm_id, r.resv_id, r.content, r.written_at, a.acm_name, a.acm_price, b.check_in, b.check_out FROM tbl_reviews r LEFT JOIN tbl_acm a ON r.acm_id = a.acm_id LEFT JOIN tbl_reservations b ON r.resv_id = b.resv_id WHERE b.resv_id = #{resvId} AND r.acm_id = #{acmId} ORDER BY r.written_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reviews SET re_photo1 = #{rePhoto1}, re_photo2 = #{rePhoto2}, re_photo3 = #{rePhoto3} WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, a.acm_name, a.acm_photo1, a.acm_photo2, a.acm_photo3 FROM tbl_reviews r JOIN tbl_acm a ON r.acm_id = a.acm_id ORDER BY r.written_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
